issue.title: [C++] clang-7 matrix entry is build using gcc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4672](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4672). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Travis sets the following environment variables:

```Java

$ export CC="clang-7"
$ export CXX="clang++-7"
$ export TRAVIS_COMPILER=g++
$ export CXX=g++
$ export CXX_FOR_BUILD=g++
$ export CC=gcc
$ export CC_FOR_BUILD=gcc
$ export PATH=/usr/lib/ccache:$PATH
```
